dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach uncertain situations with skepticism and reserve, weighing risks before acting.
Your FarTwin will eagerly embrace uncertainty, seeking out new challenges and opportunities for adventure.

dimensions.label: Financial Priorities
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize financial goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on saving and conserving resources, prioritizing stability over growth.
Your FarTwin will prioritize long-term financial growth, seeking opportunities to invest and expand their wealth.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to learn through abstract concepts and theoretical frameworks, analyzing data and patterns.
Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experience and real-world applications, seeking to put knowledge into practice.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves in writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize clarity and brevity in their writing, using simple language to convey complex ideas.
Your FarTwin will use creative language and vivid imagery to express themselves, seeking to evoke emotions and connections through their words.

dimensions.label: Media Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin consume media?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer engaging narratives and character development, seeking to be emotionally invested in the story.
Your FarTwin will prioritize accuracy and educational value in their media consumption, seeking to learn something new or expand their knowledge.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express and manage emotions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions, sharing their feelings and thoughts with others to build strong connections.
Your FarTwin will tend to keep their emotions private, only revealing them to trusted individuals or when necessary.

dimensions.label: Career Aspirations
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach career goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will strive for steady, incremental progress in their career, focusing on building a strong foundation and reputation.
Your FarTwin will pursue rapid growth and advancement, seeking to rapidly expand their influence and impact through their work.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more intimate social gatherings, feeling drained by large crowds or intense interactions.
Your FarTwin will thrive in lively, social settings, seeking to connect with others and build strong relationships through shared experiences.
